homepage_text:
This project is an open-source platform to visualize and analyze geographic data.
Below you can find information about how to use this website.
note_1: Note: The data is temporary here, it will be deleted after reloading the page. All data will be lost.
note_2: Note: After registering, you will be able to create projects and save your data in the database.
